title: Bad for Each Other (restored, with intro and outro) (1953, film noir, imdb score: 5.8)

sources.title: Bad For Each Other 1953 Restored Movie 720p
sources.description: Bad for Each Other is a 1953 American drama film noir directed by Irving Rapper and starring Charlton Heston , Lizabeth Scott and Dianne Foster . It was produced and distributed by Columbia Pictures . Its genre has been characterized as a "medical melodrama" with a film noir "bad girl".
